PrecisAppointment of RICHARD JOSEPH NEVILLE of Ottawa, Ontario, to the position of special adviser to the Minister of Veterans Affairs as Chief Negotiator, Ste. Anne's Hospital Transfer Project, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
